backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing tour packages, inquiries, car rentals, user profiles, and admin‑gated access control.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment documentation explaining slug rules, validation, and SPA routing setup.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS layer defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell loading the Vite React app.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rule routing all paths to index.html for SPA behavior.
frontend/public/404.html: Custom 404 page loading built assets for SPA fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration mapping public and admin routes with theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component gating admin routes based on login and admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users to save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeContact: Homepage contact bar showing phone, email, and MD & Chairman info.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, social icons, and dynamic year plus a referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements a responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu, logo, and auth-aware admin access.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the main page layout by wrapping content with a header and footer around an Outlet.
frontend/src/components/packages/Package: Displays a tour package card with title, description, duration, price, and a link to view details.
frontend/src/config/deployment.ts: Defines and validates the deployment slug, enforcing naming rules and checking for invalid values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and hooks for login, logout, and loading stored identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching public packages, submitting inquiries, and performing admin package and inquiry operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a monochrome theme with light and dark mode CSS variables plus a hero overlay gradient.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission, values, and company leadership using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin dashboard with profile greeting and links to manage packages and inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Lists customer inquiries with status/category controls, including loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPackagesPa: Provides CRUD interface for tour packages with dialogs for creating and editing entries.
frontend/src/pages/CarRentalsPage.tsx: Provides a car rental booking form with validation, API submission, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactInquiryPage.ts: Implements a contact inquiry form that submits tour-related messages with feedback states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero, quick contact bar, and car rental highlights with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/PackageDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays travel package details with loading, error, and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Displays public tour packages with loading, error, empty, and grid states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, issues, and implemented features for the Blackrays travel app, including branding, pages, admin area, data fetching, and asset rules.
